createCell

public ExcelCell createCell(com.conceptwave.scripting.Integer column,
                            com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean useColumnStyle)
Use this to create new cells within the row and return it.

Parameters:
column - - - the column number this cell represents
useColumnStyle - - false -the newly created cell is going to inherit style from its row. true - the newly created cell is going to inherit style from its column.
Returns:
Cell object.

getCell

public ExcelCell getCell(com.conceptwave.scripting.Integer cellnum)
Get a cell from a row.

Parameters:
cellnum - - the cell to get (0-based)
Returns:
cell representing the cell-number or null if its not defined on the row or the cell is empty.
